Securing Womenâ€™s Independence For Today Act of 2023
To make further improvements relating to women's rights and protections, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, the Judiciary, Energy and Commerce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, the Judiciary, Energy and Commerce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
